description.en: A tiny Gray Earl with a tea pot but no kettle! How the tea remains hot is a mystery. This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: A tiny Gray Earl with a tea pot but no kettle! How the tea remains hot is a mystery. This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Um pequeno Conde Cinzento com um bule de chá, mas sem chaleira! Como o chá permanece quente é um mistério. Este pet segue seu dono e recolhe os itens caídos.
description.cns: 一个带着茶壶却没有茶杯的小格雷伯爵茶！如何保持热是一个谜。 这只宠物跟随它的主人并捡起掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein winziger Butler, der seinem Besitzer mit einer heißen Tasse Tee auf Schritt und Tritt folgt und dabei Gegenstände aufsammelt.
description.fi: A tiny Gray Earl with a tea pot but no kettle! How the tea remains hot is a mystery. This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: A tiny Gray Earl with a tea pot but no kettle! How the tea remains hot is a mystery. This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: Ce Gray Earl est fort civilisé : au lieu de chercher à vous ébouillanter comme ses plus gros congénères, il tient absolument à vous servir le thé ! Ce bébé se promène avec son maître, ramassant les objets au sol et améliorant ses performances au combat.
description.id: Gray Earl kecil dengan teko teh tetapi tidak ada ketelnya! Bagaimana teh tetap panas adalah sebuah misteri. Dia akan setiai mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: A tiny Gray Earl with a tea pot but no kettle! How the tea remains hot is a mystery. This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: 気違いのお茶会が趣味のベビー帽子屋を召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 베이비 회색 백작를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: A tiny Gray Earl with a tea pot but no kettle! How the tea remains hot is a mystery. This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: A tiny Gray Earl with a tea pot but no kettle! How the tea remains hot is a mystery. This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: Питомец Бергамотус с чайником и чашкой. Как чай всегда остаётся горячим - та ещё загадка!
description.sp: ¡Un diminuto Gray Earl con tetera pero sin hervidor! Es un misterio como el té se mantiene caliente. Esta mascota sigue a su dueño recogiendo objetos soltados.
description.sw: A tiny Gray Earl with a tea pot but no kettle! How the tea remains hot is a mystery. This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: เอิร์ลสีเทาตัวเล็ก ๆ ที่มีกาน้ำชา แต่ไม่มีกาต้มน้ำ! การที่ชายังคงร้อนอยู่นั้นเป็นเรื่องลึกลับ สัตว์เลี้ยงตัวนี้ตามเจ้าของไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 召喚或解除灰色幽靈伯爵，周圍有道具時會自動拾取。
description.vi: Một Bá tước Xám tí hon với bình trà nhưng không có ấm! Làm thế nào trà vẫn còn nóng là một bí ẩn. Con vật cưng này đi theo chủ nhân của nó xung quanh và nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi.
